definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: We now bring you the full text of the Renmin Ribao editorial.
sentences.chinese: 現在全文廣播《人民日報》社論。

sentences.english: Reading the People's Daily keeps us abreast of current events.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀《人民日報》可以使我們及時瞭解當今天下大事。

sentences.english: "People's Daily" in the News twice in the version of cultural version of the presentations.
sentences.chinese: 《人民日報》於先後兩次在要聞版文化版專題介紹。

sentences.english: The book was serialized in People's Literature, a magazine co-founded by Mao.
sentences.chinese: 這本書是人民日報的連載，毛事其中的合夥創辦人。

sentences.english: 2003 selected "People's Daily Overseas Edition" literary supplement.
sentences.chinese: 2003年入選“人民日報海外版”文藝副刊。

sentences.english: The Global Times, a tabloid owned by the Communist Party's People's Daily newspaper, hit hard upon the theme of besiegement.
sentences.chinese: 人民日報下屬媒體《環球時報》對美國圍攻反映激烈。

sentences.english: The newspaper said it will also upgrade its 72 foreign and domestic bureaus.
sentences.chinese: 人民日報說，還將更新其72個海外和國內記者站。

sentences.english: It had to issue the People's Daily commentary.
sentences.chinese: 它還要在《人民日報》上發表評論。

sentences.english: The ranking, which was noted by thePeople's Daily, might be a point of pride in China.
sentences.chinese: 《人民日報》指出，這個排名可能讓中國很自豪。

sentences.english: People's daily editor zhou ruijin how to treat former vice shanghai property market?
sentences.chinese: 人民日報原副總編周瑞金如何看待上海樓市？

sentences.english: The headline glared from the page . The denial was bannered by the People's Daily.
sentences.chinese: 人民日報》用橫貫全頁的大標題報道了那項否認。

sentences.english: This article was carried in yesterday's The People's Daily .
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章刊在了昨天的《人民日報》上。

sentences.english: He was reported 10 times by People’s Daily as “old friend”.
sentences.chinese: 人民日報曾10次在報道中稱其爲”老朋友“。

sentences.english: The overseas edition of the People's Daily is a smaller offshoot of the domestic edition.
sentences.chinese: 人民日報的海外版是國內版的一個小分支。

sentences.english: The "People's Daily" gave banner headlines to our meeting.
sentences.chinese: 《人民日報》用通欄標題報導了我們的會見。

sentences.english: The Renmin Ribao report supplies the facts concerning this issue.
sentences.chinese: 《人民日報》記者寫的這份材料說明了問題的真相。

definition: Global Times (weekly digest of international news from People's Daily 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4])
online version of the People's Daily, 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4]
guide (e.g. book or other printed material)
